title: Design cross-border payment scheduling UI component
summary: Create intuitive UI components for users to schedule future international payments. Interface must display available execution dates, time zones, and integrate seamlessly with existing payment flows while maintaining accessibility standards.

title: Implement FX rate preview display for scheduled payments
summary: Build real-time FX rate preview functionality showing current exchange rates and estimated costs for scheduled cross-border payments. Display must update dynamically and clearly show rate validity periods.

title: Create FX rate lock option with 24-hour window
summary: Implement rate locking mechanism allowing users to secure exchange rates for 24-hour periods. System must handle rate validation, expiry logic, and integrate with FX providers while preventing rate speculation abuse.

title: Build rate expiry countdown timer component
summary: Create visual countdown timer component displaying remaining time for locked FX rates. Component must update in real-time and trigger appropriate notifications as expiry approaches.

title: Design rate lock conditions display interface
summary: Create clear interface showing rate lock terms, conditions, and compliance requirements. Display must include fee structures, validity periods, and regulatory disclaimers in user-friendly format.

title: Implement payment execution date selector
summary: Build date picker component for scheduling payment execution dates. Must handle business days, time zones, and validate against FX rate availability while providing clear feedback on processing timelines.

title: Create scheduled payment cancellation workflow
summary: Develop comprehensive cancellation process for scheduled payments including user confirmation, status validation, and notification triggers. Workflow must handle various payment states and maintain audit trail.

title: Build refund logic for cancelled scheduled payments
summary: Implement automated refund processing for cancelled scheduled payments. Must handle locked rate fees, partial refunds, and integrate with existing refund infrastructure while maintaining transaction history.

title: Design beta rollout feature toggle system
summary: Create feature flag system enabling controlled beta release of scheduled payments functionality. Must support user segmentation, gradual rollout percentages, and instant rollback capabilities.

title: Create beta user feedback collection framework
summary: Build comprehensive feedback system for beta users including in-app surveys, usage analytics, and structured feedback forms. Framework must capture user experience data and integrate with product analytics platform.

title: Integrate real-time FX rate provider APIs
summary: Establish API integrations with foreign exchange rate providers to fetch real-time currency exchange rates. System must support multiple provider endpoints, handle authentication, implement rate caching, and ensure reliable fallback mechanisms.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: integrate FX providers for real-time rates

title: Implement FX rate lock commitment management system
summary: Build a comprehensive system to manage FX rate lock commitments with 24-hour validity windows. Includes creating, storing, validating, and expiring rate locks while maintaining audit trails for compliance.

title: Build automatic rate reversion on funding failure
summary: Implement automated logic to revert locked FX rates when payment funding fails at execution time. System must detect insufficient funds, cancel rate locks, and trigger appropriate user notifications.

title: Create rate lock metadata storage schema
summary: Design and implement database schema to store FX rate lock metadata including lock ID, user ID, currency pairs, locked rates, creation timestamps, expiry times, and associated payment details.

title: Implement rate lock expiry timestamp tracking
summary: Create timestamp tracking mechanism for FX rate lock expiry with automatic invalidation after 24-hour window. Includes scheduled jobs for expiry processing and user notification triggers.

title: Build FX provider unavailability handling logic
summary: Implement robust error handling for FX provider outages including fallback to cached rates, provider switching logic, and user notifications when rate locking is temporarily unavailable.

title: Create rate validation at payment execution time
summary: Implement validation logic to verify FX rate lock validity when scheduled payment executes. Check expiry status, rate consistency, and user authorization before processing cross-border transfer.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: rate validation at payment execution time

title: Implement new rate confirmation workflow for expired locks
summary: Build user interface workflow to handle expired FX rate locks, prompting users to confirm new rates before payment execution. Include rate comparison display and explicit user consent capture.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: new rate confirmation workflow for expired locks

title: Build rate lock abuse prevention controls
summary: Implement risk controls to prevent FX rate speculation and abuse, including rate lock frequency limits, suspicious pattern detection, and automated blocking mechanisms to maintain system integrity.

title: Implement cross-border payment regulatory compliance checks
summary: Build automated compliance validation system for international transfers including sanctions screening, regulatory reporting requirements, and real-time compliance checks before payment execution.

title: Create large-value transfer documentation system
summary: Develop documentation generation and storage system for high-value international transfers, ensuring regulatory compliance with record-keeping requirements and providing audit-ready documentation.

title: Build comprehensive audit logging for all payment events
summary: Implement detailed audit trail system capturing all payment lifecycle events including rate locks, schedule modifications, executions, and cancellations with timestamp and user attribution.

title: Implement multi-channel notification system (email/SMS/in-app)
summary: Build notification framework supporting email, SMS, and in-app alerts for rate expiry warnings, payment status updates, and transaction confirmations with user preference management.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: automated notifications for rate expiry/payment status

title: Create finance team monitoring dashboard
summary: Develop real-time monitoring dashboard for finance team displaying scheduled payment volumes, rate lock utilization, processing status, and key performance metrics for cross-border transactions.

title: Build orphaned payment auto-cancellation logic
summary: Implement automated cleanup system to identify and cancel orphaned scheduled payments where rate locks have expired or funding conditions are not met, with proper notification and refund processing.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Edge cases cover FX provider outages and insufficient funds at execution
